Performance is the key to career growth! Discuss in detail the impact of training and development on employee job performance.

 

 

For and employee to perform well in his work the right training and guidence should be given. Not every individual who walks in to a office knows what he or she is supposed to do. Sometimes  a job description is different from an individuals qualification as to what he or she has studied, that is why organizations introduce training and development programs to train an individual in different aspects with respect to the job and also develop their personality, enhance their confidence level and encourage them. These key skills which are introduced in the training period make an impact on the performance of the individual. Training and development  programs with respect to the job helps the employees to put in efforts in their perfomance as they know what is expected out of them.

To encourage the employees, managers introduce various incentives and bonus which attract the employees to work effectively and concentrate on their performance to get the desired results which will help them in earning those insentives. Incentives are introduced to boast the employees to work hard towards acheving their target on time.

In due time based on their performace every employee has an opportunity to be promoted in his field. Not every employee can be promoted, perfomance of an employee shows how well the individual knows his work and is able to deliver the right results in right time. Employee job performace is very important for the growth of a company. The company should make sure of the right training given to the employees to make an impact on their performance, this will help in the growth of every individual. Thus perfomance plays a significant role to career growth.
